domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock The only people who will be shouting 'blame' are journalists and lefties. The rest of us ie the majority are comfortable with what the government are doing.

If blame is attached to anyone it will be the media. The snivelling, negative, moronic lot of you.
